thread.title: One of my favorite hotel in Beijing
thread.title_full: One of my favorite hotel in Beijing - Review of Four Seasons Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: MGSH80
title: One of my favorite hotel in Beijing
text:
I visit Beijing monthly for business and most of the time I stay at Four Seasons. The personal is friendly and professional.
Always love the coffee station for early check-out and great afternoon perfect for long meetings in the lobby.
The rooms are extremely spacious and very comfortable, love the shoes polishing service.
I will definitely recommend this hotel, the Italian restaurant is also a must try when in Beijing. I can just not wait for the top bar to hotel.
Special mention to Andrew, the GM such a great host and always so helpful all my requests!!
